name: omniknight_purification

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Heroes
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Creates a divine barrier around a target unit which grants them Spell Immunity and 100% resistance to Magic Damage.
notes: Repel acts the same as other sources of spell immuniy, except it can be purged.
cmb:
50/50/50/50
14
lore: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.
name: omniknight_repel

affects:
ABILITY: Passive, Aura
AFFECTS: Enemies
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near, including Spell Immune enemies.
lore: The holy embodiment of Purist Thunderwrath is enough to weaken those of lesser faith.
name: omniknight_degen_aura

affects:

notes:
